1. Attribute X is set to value A.
2. Attribute Y is set to value B.
3. Internet connection is on slow speed - 2G

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
